cause.description:
Please continue to pray for all the little warriors fighting all types of Leukemia. Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia – The Most Common Childhood Cancer About 3200 new cases are diagnosed each year in children. The second most common type of Cancer found in children is Acute Myeloid Leukemia.
Let's all work together and B+!
*PLEASE, feel free to post prayer requests with in the cause.* As I've witnessed every little prayer can make a HUGE difference on a young child's life at risk.
Thanks for joining the HPCL cause!
1. Prayer Requests
2. Research Updates
3. HOPE & PRAY for our smallest, yet bravest warriors
cause.mission: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass, it is about learning to dance in the rain.
cause.name: Hope & Pray: Childhood Leukemia
